name: Nelly Fazio
content: Nelly Fazio Nelly Fazio, Ph.D. Associate Professor City University of New York (CUNY) Affiliations: The City College of New York Department of Computer Science and CAISS Center The Graduate Center Department of Computer Science Brief Bio Contact Info The Graduate Center Crypto Group (GCCG) Research Interests: My research interests are in cryptography and information security. My research publications are available online. See also my DBLP entry and my Google Scholar profile. Research Funding: My research is funded in part by an NSF CAREER award and other grants by the National Science Foundation, by the U.S. Army Research Laboratory and the U.K. Ministry of Defence, by a CUNY CIRG award and two PSC-CUNY awards. The support of the respective funding agencies is gratefully acknowledged. Students: Dissertation Advising: Marios Georgiou (Graduate Center of CUNY). Fall '14–Spring '20. Milinda Perera (Graduate Center of CUNY). Fall '10–Spring '15. Cyrus Peterpaul (Graduate Center of CUNY). Spring '13–Fall '14. Undergraduate Advising: Anuja Prabhakar (National Institute of Information Technology, New Delhi, India). Spring 2014. (co-advised with Prof. K. Ravindran) Grace Mark (NYU GSTEM summer program). Summer 2013. Anuja Prabhakar (National Institute of Information Technology, New Delhi, India). Summer 2013. Linda Wong (City College of CUNY). Spring '12–Fall 12. Stanis Laus Billy (City College of CUNY). Summer 2010. Milinda Perera (City College of CUNY). Summer 2010. Sam Neubardt (City College of CUNY). Fall 2010. Kevin Ramdath (City College of CUNY). Fall 2010.
